attributes.action: Make interest which is greater than 49% APR illegal. Subject to severe fines and imprisonment
attributes.additional_details: The people who can least afford to pay interest and who are in most need of a short unsecured loans are subject to harsh interest rates which are unregulated. In my youth, interest rates in excess of 49% were considered to be harsh and luxurious, and illegal. We should revert to what worked well then. I would suggest that severe penalties are imposed if exceeded including financial penalties and terms of imprisonment for directors of the business. This should also cover doorstep lenders.
